DOC.brief_summary: Compare the treatment efficacy of black cohosh extract 80 mg daily and placebo for moderate to severe menopausal symptoms
DOC.brief_title: Black Cohosh Extract for Treatment of Moderate to Severe Menopausal Symptoms
DOC.detailed_description: Compare the treatment efficacy of black cohosh extract 80 mg/day an placebo for moderate to severe menopausal symptoms with Kupperman menopausal index and MENQOL
DOC.criteria: Age at least 40 years Peri or post menopause Moderate to severe menopausal symptoms (Kupperman index at least 20) Use hormonal treatment or other treatments within 4 weeks Use atorvastatin azathioprine or cyclosporin within 4 weeks BMI at least 30 kg m2 Allergic to drug or components Liver disease or abnormal liver function test Psychiatric disease Alcoholic or drug abuse Vegetarian
